A forecast of more possible storms this weekend is linked to the remnants of Hurricane Genevieve in the Baja Peninsula.

name: sfchronicle

name: sfchronicle
text: Cal Fire officials expect the LNU Lightning Complex to continue to grow, with the blazes making runs in multiple directions and thunderstorms in the forecast. name: sfchronicle

name: sfchronicle
